title: Ethiopia Declares An Immediate, Unilateral Cease-fire In Tigray
content:
1. Ethiopia Declares An Immediate, Unilateral Cease-fire In Tigray  NPR
  2. Ethiopian forces withdraw from Tigray regional capital Mekelle  CNN
  3. Ethiopia gov't and Tigray rebels agree to ceasefire  Al Jazeera English
  4. Tigrayan forces enter regional capital after months of fighting  Financial Times
  5. Ethiopian government declares 'unilateral ceasefire' amid rebel advance in Tigray  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
